about_the_game:
Stronghold Conquest


A game that will take you back to the Middle Ages. Feel yourself as a defender of the castle, which is trying to capture the enemies! You will have different types of weapons at your disposal - ballistas, cannons, catapults, as well as the ability to use specially designed traps for enemies - traps with stones, spikes, and burning barrels. Use all these units to protect your castle - don't let the enemy conquer it!
The enemy will send siege weapons to your castle all the time, meanwhile, you have to develop a strategy to balance the defense of your castle, and eventually carry out a successful attack on the enemy castle.
For each destroyed enemy weapon - you will earn gold, and the gold can be used to buy new weapons, new ammunition, and traps. When your defense becomes strong enough - choose strategic moments to destroy the enemy's castle and win.

Key Features


  • A variety of medieval weapons and distribution of units for successful attacks;

  • The combat system of the game offers a high degree of dynamics, a variety of attacks, special moves, and combos so that the player can feel the absolute intensity of the fights;

  • The game offers realistic physics and the ability to interact with the environment, including the ability to destroy objects or use items in combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with latest service packs
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

  • OS: Windows 10/11 with latest service packs
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 (4 GB)

short_description: In this thrilling Tower Defense - type game, you will become the main defender of your kingdom. Build powerful guns and strategically deploy them on the battlefield to fend off waves of incoming enemies. Your goal is to protect your territory and destroy all threats using various types of guns.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese, Indonesian
